column9: and soon after turned into the lane leading to the home of Mr. Kilgore. He found that both Bobby and Sallie had been to school
column10: but they had nothing to tell. When we are more than usually anxious to learn something
column11: it seems that every one whom we meet is stupid beyond endurance. If we are in a strange place and apply for information
column12: the ignorance of nearly every person is exasperating.
